GrxInfoText.android:summary: You can add the same second key to a group of preferences in order to save resources in observers, for example. Your observer will react to the groupkey only, then you can load the related preferences values to update your mods. This feature helps you to build mods in a simpler way.

GrxButtonPreference.android:title: Button Changing a Group key
GrxButtonPreference.android:summary: This could be used to update the mods only when user click the button, saving resources, avoiding restarting apps or whaterver ..

GrxInfoText.android:summary: Or you simply can share a group key among several preferences and just observe this group key for them..
You can define 2 actions to send via broadcasts per preference. You can use this feature to update your mods, reacting to the broadcast in a receiver.
